If I remember correctly Earth had roleplayed Cheetor at some points, then h=
e brought him to my RPG, which is seperate from NBW. I do belive that Earth=
's arguement has no base, as well as the fact that he changed the character=
 around. I would belive that Cheetor can be yours to control, with permissi=
on from Earth, because he did own him, I'd just treat it like a deseased li=
st thing, with the controller still around.
  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: Jason Lind 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, October 0=
4, 2000 7:18 PM
  Subject: saw a friend going to the enemy!


  [I had cont=
rol of cheetor but earth got on my case. saying he had him but he 
  is not=
 useing him. most likely he will never use cheetor.]

  Arcangel





  he =
thought for awhile.



  Arcangel:



  "cheetor is not on past earth. foll=
ow me."



  he started flying slowly then he saw Hot Rod driving towards t=
he Alliance 
  base. he had no words for this. he saw his best fring going =
to the enemy. 
  but Hot Rod was not going to fight. so why was he going th=
at way. Arcangel 
  knew something was up but he kept going to the maximal =
base. was Hot Rod a 
  alliance member? what was zardus going to do with hi=
m? and what about the 
  matrix. if Hot Rod did turn on him he as well seal=
ed his fate.
